title: Advocate / Legal Associate
description: An Advocate provides legal representation, drafts legal documents, researches case laws, and advises clients on legal rights and obligations.
responsibilities: Prepare legal briefs, arguments, and documents.
Represent clients in court hearings, mediations, and arbitrations.
Conduct deep legal research and analyze case precedents.
Advise clients regarding litigation risks and legal obligations.
Negotiate settlements and manage client communications.

skills.name: Legal research Litigation Case analysis Drafting Negotiation
